title: My Summoner Level is forever lvl 3?
body: I'm an avid looker of the boards and I would love to be able to contribute to the community more but unfortunately I'm unaware of how to level up my boards  account, or if it's even supposed to display my in-game level which has been 30 for some time now. Any kind of aid would be much appreciated! {{champion:117}}

replies.body: Your account needs to sync with the boards, usually when posting for the first time.  It looks like your post here has completed the sync.  Let me know if you still have any issues posting!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ORIcZgcR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-17T16:39:10.972+0000)
>
> Your account needs to sync with the boards, usually when posting for the first time.  It looks like your post here has completed the sync.  Let me know if you still have any issues posting!

Yay!! It did, thank you for drawing that to my attention! :D
